content.detailedDescription: I was driving to the end of castor road and making a left turn onto faith road when i seen this fireball in the shape of a blimp shoot across the sky just in front of me but only a short distance before it dissappeard into nothingness. the way i would describe it would be like from a science fiction movie of dissappearing into another dimension, because, the object did not shoot further into the sky and fade away. it appeared to be stationary at first and then shot off and just vanished right through the sky like it went through a portal. very weird and hard to describe accept to say like it went through a stargate of sorts and was gone. like it would appear for a person to dissappear into a wall. before reaching the end of the road, i was curious about what appeared to be an orange glow in the sky ahead of me. it was hard to make out for the trees but when i got to the end, and especially when i turned, i could see it more clearly and then it shot off and vanished. i am not a big ufo fanatic but this is the second time i have seen something this clearly strange since i have lived here in rowan county. i had reported another sighting around a year ago but i recieved back an e-mail suggesting that i was not being truthfull and the report was not accepted because i could not remember the date. it was some years before that i had that experience and i tried to then re-submit the report guessing at an exact date to that event but i still could not be sure. that is why i thought i would report this one right away. i am sure this time. i hope this report might be accepted.
content.summary: Fireball object that suddenly dissappeared

content.detailedDescription:
photographing sunset backlit surf at noth hampton beach with my wife i noticed a bright orange light in southern sky. at first glance i thought it was an aircraft decending into logan int. but it had appeared otu fo nowhere and was wrong color for landing lights even sodium ones. so discounting air traffic into logan international which is in the rough direction of sighting due to color and brigthness far brighter then landing lights which are sometime visible from this location and also discounting military aircraft from pease ang to the north west of the location where kc-135a and r's along with a squadren of adf varient f-16's are based, agian due to color and brigthness. i am extremely familer with all the various lights on aircraft including tankers during refueling operations as i am a former employee of pratt & whitney aircraft and have family members in air force. i asked wife if she saw this light and she affirmed she did and that it was odd in it being steady and not moving. at this point i demounted my nikon d-70 and fired off one frame as i checked to see if i photgraphed it my wife said "it's gone it folded in on itself and disappeared.". we estimate the object to be about ten to twenty miles away. how did i feel shaken for reasons i refuse to go into.The object appeared absolutly motionless in reference to a bath house to the right of the frame.

 magnifing the object in photoshop reveled a cylindrcal object with lighted rings orangeish in color.

 camera details and settings:
 
body: nikon d-70 digtal slr with current firmware installed
lens: nikor 70-300 f/4-5.6 
focal length at time of shot 300mm effective 450mm
exposure: programed auto 1/20 sec f/5.6
metering: multi-pattern
exposure comp. 0
sensitivity: iso 500
white balence: auto
focus: manual  infinite
tone comp: auto
no flash
color mode 3 srgb
hue adjustment 0
auto sharpening
long exposure noise reduction off  
frame size 3008 x 1960
content.summary: Unknown motionless bright steady orange light in in southernly sky

content.detailedDescription:
Observer was sitting on the hotel balcony at dusk (drinking tea)facing eastwards when the spheres started rising above a house some 200 meters away. all were the same colour, bright red but with a "halo" of mist around each. observer thought the objects were some sort of firework.

all bar one were in a vertical pattern to each other and rising rapidly. they appeared smaller in comparisson to the full moon. there was good weather on this date and the cloud was minimal and judged to be between 20-30,000ft. when the objects got above cloud level and at this time about the size (but not as bright) as a first magnitude star, they separated out from eachother and continued their journey upwards until they were no longer visable.

observer was totally dumbfounded by the event and couldn't react during it to either 1. call for witnesses 2. get a camera 3. react in any other way but to sit and watch it.

i am filing this report on behalf of the witness who can be contacted through myself
content.summary: 8 red, glowing spheres, rising rapidly in a straight line, then separating above cloud level.

content.detailedDescription: Driving up on a mountain above the fog line and noticed a very bizarre light in the sky above.  it was eyecatching and very noticeable.  moving around in the sky it appeared to be spinning it put off a light red light below it and made my camera go staticky from time to time.  i could hear the animals below going wild cows dogs etc.  i filmed it and have approx eleven min of tape.  the tape is pretty good.  i am curious what to do with it and if there is any financial value in it i am of course interested in that.  do not be mislead into thinking this is a hoax for money it is for real and i am very curious to find out what this thing is.  so far everyone that i have shown is equally stumped and believing in this strange ufo
content.shape: Cigar,  Cone,  Circle,  Cylinder,  Disc,  Fireball,  Oval,  Sphere,  Other
content.summary: Moving erradically around in sky could see pulsating

content.detailedDescription: I was just finishing dinner when i decided to step on my apartment's balcony for some fresh air.  the balcony faces the east and that's where i saw the lights.  the time was about 8:30-ish, i didn't really pay attention.  first i thought they were lights from the factories beyond the horizon, but i as i looked, they were moving.  one of the lights was moving left and right.  the formation was coming towards my direction, there were blinking light on either side of the light, red and blue.  at first i thought they were airplanes, but when they got near, i didn't hear any jet engine noise, and it was awfully quiet for a propeller driven plane (usually you can hear a cessna flying even if they are in the clouds).  when i saw them with my binoculars, i tired to look for the distingushing shape of an airplane fuselage, but it was hard to see in the night sky. i was a bit stunned and surprised after seeing them (never thought i'd see a ufo in my lifetime!!).  i lost sight of the lights when they passed over my partment building.
content.shape: Boomerang,  Chevron,  Flash,  Saturn-like,  Triangle,  Other
content.summary: 3 lights, flying in a triangualar formation

content.detailedDescription: I just noticed this today (11/26/2006) as i was looking at old pictures of a trip i took in september to rocky mountain national park. i took the following picture with a canon digital rebel (6.1 megapixel version). the picture is extremely high resolution but i wasn't using a telephoto lens so when you zoom in on the object it becomes highly pixelated. i have no explanation for this object, and never noticed it was in my picture until now. i have attached the orginal jpeg file for review.
content.summary: Ufo over rmnp

content.detailedDescription: Driving on freeway towards austin, tx suddenly noticed bright street colored lights above 30 minutes outside of san antonio,tx. many people saw these multi colored lights and they pulled over to the side of the road to watch the lights. the lights  started dancing around then they instantly disappeared.
content.summary: 30 minutes outside of san antonio, tx look ed like street lights dancing then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
on approximately november 17, 1991, i turned the channel on our tv set, to watch the first program of "sightings", when my husband, ray, yelled
me from our bedroom,"hey honey! hurry up,come here!" i ran to the bedroom
and saw my husband standing in front of the floor-to-ceiling, and wall-to-wall windows overlooking our large back yard. he was looking up over the
house in the rear of our yard. i hurried to his side,and looked in the direction of his index finger. i nearly fainted and grabbed his shoulder
to keep from falling. i had been seeing ufos all my life but none that
close without the help of hypnosis.It looked like two saucers, one upside down over the oher, with an outsized tea cup, upside down, on top. there
were six to eight  porthole windows visible from where we were looking,
and there was a "gray" person loking back at us from each one of those windows. i also saw three or more human men standing behind some of the grays.Ever so often, one of the men would duck down to look over the
shoulder of the gray,to see ray and i.One of the men had dark hair and
was dressed in a tunic with something tied around his waist.The other humans were dressed the same way, suggesting a uniform to me. the grays were busy doing something in front of them with their hands. the outside
of the ship was sort of shiny but grungy,as if it had come through some
nasty dust,oil,and acidic atmosphere. the underside of the ship was open and fire was blasting out and then curling back in on itself. the whole ship was so big, ti "covered" the space well over the rear house, the
yards surrounding the house,and the rear house and it's surrounding yards on the next street over from us. that rear house was being rented by an el monte police officer. i finally yelled, "now! do you believe me? now!
go ahead and tell me you aren't seeing this!!" at my stunned husband. he whispered back,"yeah, i believe you now.",and whispered prayers to saint somebody in spanish. at that, the ship moved slightly, then rose and moved slowly to the west until it was over the el monte airport, two or so blocks away,and rapidly took off heading south and upwards. ray just as
suddenly sucked in his breath and yelled,"jesus christ!! look at that sonofabitch go!!" i helped him to our bed, and then called the police. i told them what i've written here. two years later the psychology director
fred newmeyer, and his helper drove into our back yard and took measurements and notes. since then ive had other sightings, some of them 
fairly simple, and others,just plain otherworldly.I went to cero for awhile for help but had to stop from lack of money and transportation.
 i hope this helps to tie in other sightings in the el monte area. there
have been so many, both in my family and other people,a great many of them from the chicano families.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Huge disc came over back yard and stayed for 10 min. grays and humans on board.Fire curled from underside.

content.detailedDescription:
Between evening appointments i decided to pull over and have some me time, reading an article in my favourite broadsheet newspaper, and enjoying some tea. my eyes wandered from the paragraphs to the windscreen and the darkness beyond. stepping out of the car, enjoying the cold night air, i marvelled at the beauty of the stars, watching for satellites far above me, i tried to imagine what early humans felt when they witnessed shooting stars.  as i acknowledged the familiar outline of stars in the plough, my vision picked up a movement between the stars, i though it was an aircraft, but this one had no port or starboard lights, no flashing beacons, and no familiar outline, and most significantly , no sound. my eyes to in the scene rechecking with co ordinates onthe ground to give me a sense of its altitude and speed, and also its direction of travel. i deduced that as the road i was on was above sea level, and i was observing at an angle of less than 45 degrees, that the "object" was at less than 1,000 feet, i observed it for over 10 seconds in which time it moved from my far left to my far right, and at a nne heading, and moving approximatley 80-150mph  . my disbelief continued as i realised that the "object" was triangular, and very sharp in appearence with red lights along its border. as i obsereved i made notes of its behaviour, noting that it was turning on its nose to tail axis in that as one "wing" raised, the other lowered. and most significantly, it made no sound whatsoever. having operated with american stealth aircaft during the gulf war, i knew this was no stealth fighter, though i also noted this was the size of a stealth bomber or bigger, though to the best of my knowledge the bomber had big noisey engines, and  is more v shaped than a full triangle. 
i have never seen anything like this, and later drving around other locations in the vicinity i felt that the craft flew directly over the city i was in, and must have been seen by someone else, becauze this thing was big. and in my opinion, by the way it was behaving , it was using its flight path to observe features of the land below. i do not think this was an alien space craft, but i do beleive that this is more probably a form of aircraft to replace the aging u2. i lost sight of it as it flew off to my far right over the brow of a hill, i also lost sight of it as it blended in with the dark sky.
content.summary: Very large silent triangle with red lights along/underneath its "wings"

content.detailedDescription:
Daer sirs. i live in a 4plex in north park, san diego,ca. after enjoying
a thanksgiving dinner directly below ,i came up the stairs to have a smoke.
as i got up stairs i could see a strange brillant globe to the left of
the setting cresent moon. i went inside and got my binoculars to get a better vew. when i got outside it was gone. then i discounted it as an secondary glow of the moon. noway! it came back as two large balls of light.
i called to my friends downstairs to come up and see the show,and they did
one by one. we both shared the eyeglasses,but when i had them i saw what
i thought were dimly lit jet iterceptors. there were three of them
coming in the direction of north island naval air station. when they arrived you could see the wake, or contrails from them, which was
illuminated by the balls of light, which then merged as one glowing globe.
since i had the binoculars , i had the best view of what was going on.
what i saw next blew my mind, and this event happened exactly 24 hrs ago 
and today i have been in a good wierd mood all day!
the three mystery objects joined the glowing ball, directly below it 
spread apart to creat a fan shape or a triangle. i would like to apoligize
i just remembered that there were 4 objects they made a happy face
directly below the object. they were perfectly spaced and motionless
when put together as one unit. i realize now why it is so important to
report these things when they are fresh in your mind. after one triangle
the 4 objects faded, but the ball glowed just for a few seconds more.
even though the 4 faded i could see them as 4 black dots still illuminated
by the dim cresent of the moon. surrounding them was the dripping
contrails of there arrival. this sounds long winded but, i have to
get it off my chest. i really care. this all happened reall in less 
than 5 mins. as fast as it happened it just faded, leaving just a sliver
of mist around a setting cresent moon. by the way i am 53 years old and clean and sobr, i know what i saw, and will never forget it! thank you.
content.summary: Glowing white ball next to setting moon. 3 more objects appeared making triangle then disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: A star sized object seemed to have a flashing red/blue, most stars are either red (hot) or blue (cool) to the naked eye, so i got out my binoculars. i saw a definite red side (right) blue side (left). the object was stationary the colors phlorescent. after about 15 min. clouds obscured my view. i live on a ranch 22 acres no people, no lights, i watch the sky regularly, i feel certain this was not a star or helecopter.
content.summary: Star gazeing then noticed  a peculiar color then looked through binoculars

content.detailedDescription:
Se escucho una vibracion extra���a por un periodo muy corto(2 minutos maximo)y a los perros ladrando. luego se fue a ver que pasaba afuera y se obserbo a los perros como asustados y un circulo de 6 metros de diametro en el que el pasto estaba como cortado y quemado. a la vez dentro de este cirulo de 6m de diametro se encontro otros 4 cirulos de 1 metro de diametro.
 el objeto no fue visualizado lo que se descrive aca son marcas, de lo que yo creo que son de un ovni en forma de disco.
 resumen: a circle of 6 meters diameter, and into this circle, others 4 circles of 1m diameter.
 sorry for writting in spanish but my english is poor,realy sorry.

 si quieren puedo conseguir fotos que son de una amiga.

    gracias.
content.summary: Ruido extraño (como vibracion) y una marca en el pasto(circulo: 6m diametro)

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking on the beach in oceanside, california, sunday, september 21 1997. it was around 4:45 pm. my four year old son garreth was with me. we were at the water's edge. the sun was starting to get closer to the horizon. i happened to look back towards the cliff area. i saw this oval object that was over the row of a-frame cottages, yet it was below the cliff line and other houses behind it. if you do a google earth search for the area where the flying object sat, it would be latitude: 33���11'53.93"n and longitude:117���23'14.72"w. where i was standing on the water's edge was latitude: 33���11'55.62"n and longitude:117���23'20.90"w.

what attracted me to the object was a glimmer of light as if reflecting the sun's light into a mirror and then moving the mirror so that it would pulse. we walked closer to the object walking away from the water's edge. i could see the color of the light which to make a basic description, looked like gold spray paint sprayed onto water and then sloshed so that the gold paint would circle around inside the oval shape. gold spray paint has dark components in it especially if it is sprayed too thick.  imagine an oval tank filled with water, with underwater bright white lights inside the tank submerged and the thick gold "paint" material swirling around on top of the water as it won't mix with the water. there would be times when the "paint" was not too thick which allowed the light behind it to shine through making it brighter and darker as the "paint" material swirled around. the tank is on its side in this instance like a large picture frame. there was no pattern to the movement of the material inside the oval. random swirls as if stirred with a spoon and then reversed at will. the object was the size of a large van. it was a windy day, there were seagulls flying a few yards from the object at palm tree level, and they were having a hard time negotiating the wind. the object was dead still. i at first thought it was a gag blimp or some type of kite. i looked for wires, there were none.  nothing short of billboard scaffolding could have suspended that large object over the cottage roofing to keep it from moving in the wind. there was no scaffolding. nothing extended from the a-frame cottages and nothing connected to the houses on the cliff above the object. still not wanting to believe this object was hanging there by itself, motionless, i moved closer. it was the same thing. no wires, no poles no metal trusses, not even an electric wire to supply power for the light effects. the object was facing the sun which was setting in a northwest position over the horizon. i moved closer to the object and noticed that behind the oval that was displaying the liquid light show, there was a turbine. yes a turbine that spun counterclockwise. looked like what you would see on a jet liner. there were light blue and pink lights coming out of the turbine as it spun. no specific light recepticals, just shafts of pastel lights coming out of the the area of the spinning vanes.  but there was no noise at all. i could not understand how light could be coming out of the turbine as there were no bulbs, reflectors, etc. it was mystical to say the least. there were other people at the beach picnic tables across the cottages, gathered around, and i looked at them to see if they had noticed the object. they never glanced at it. made me think, is this a gag, and everybody else has already seen it and grown tired of it? a young boy crossed in front of my son and me as we stood across the row of cottages and i looked at him to see if he was viewing what we saw trying to get him to look up at the object. he looked at me and wondered why i was looking at him. he never looked up at the object. my son and i looked at the object for a good 30 minutes, the sun was still brightly shining. i had to leave to get the car home in time for my parents to go to 5 p.M. religious services. i was late. the car was parked on the street at the cliff line south of the cottages, quite a ways away from the oceanside amphitheater. i kept looking back at the object and it was still there in the same position. i reluctantly got into the car and drove home. i usually have a video camera with me. i'm a recording artist with music videos on mtv asia. that day my brother had taken the video camera with him. of all the times to be without a camera. and to think my rock video garden of eden that aired all over asia on mtv asia and channel v from 1996 on, had famous pictures and video of "ufos" in it. i can still remember the object. i did not see any windows, any beings looking out, any doors, wings, tires. above all no motion and no noise whatsoever. no smell of fuel, aviation or otherwise, no fumes, no exhaust heat mirages, no heat. 
the gulls were the loudest thing at the scene. the turbine was molded onto the oval light frame. if i had not stepped to one side i would not have noticed the turbine. it had dimension. it was a solid object. whatever it was seemed to only be seen by myself and my son. this object was at rooftop of the cottages, which are still there on the beach access road at oceanside beach, and can be seen on google earth. it was not a misty hazy apparition. it was well defined, unmistakably within arm's reach and in more than  enough broad daylight to tell it was hanging there. it was definitely a flying machine. i have no idea where it came from. i did not see it leave as i left before it did. i went back the next day and it was gone. i wish i had stayed till the object disappeared. i wish i had video footage of it. i wonder why it showed itself to me and not to the others on the beach. i should make a rendering of the object to at least give a visual of what we saw and in case someone else has seen this same object and reports or has reported it, for posterity.
content.summary: Ufo over cottages oceanside beach. a close encounter.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the balcony of our beach front condo in ft. walton beach. if memory serves, it was around 9:00pm or so. i was sitting there looking out into the night when suddenly a white glowing ball of light appeared in the sky. i don't know how to tell you how big it was. to me, if i were to stretch my hand out to touch it, the object seemed to be the size of a baseball, perhaps that will help determine how far away it was. it was slightly to the left of our hotel balcony but i had a clear view of the thing. suddenly another light appeared beside it. several minutes later another light appeared also. these lights just appeared and then went out. they did not fade out or appear to burn out, they just went out, and then appeared to blink back on, one at a time. there was no sound and no evidence of the lights being flares. by that i mean there was no fire trail or sparks that could be seen. i yelled for my kids to come out and look after i saw the first one appear. all three of us wittnessed the lights. they were bright white and appeared to be burning or glowing. i can tell you is that the moon was almost full that night and we had a clear unobstructed view of the horizon. we could also see the water beneath the lights. i could not make out a boat or floating object of any kind.  a while later (maybe 15 minutes or more later), after the lights had dissapeared for the last time, we did hear military jets overhead. we often heard and saw jets out over the water during the week we spent down there, but we always "heard" them.  i told someone i was talking to the next day about the lights and he said they were the after burners on f14s. i told him that i didn't hear any jets at all and pointed out that we heard them all the time. he said they were too far out to hear. these lights were not that far out. if they were in fact farther out than they appeared, they must have been huge! i do remember seeing a large ship at the edge of the horizon during most of the time we were there, but these lights seemed much closer to us, at least closer than halfway between us and the horizon. we spoke with some friends who were staying a few hotels down from us who also saw the lights. several days later, they said they had seen the lights again and that they did seem to be flares. do you have any idea what these lights were? would't you hear or see the jets leaving these after burners? could it have been something the navy seals were doing out in the water that we simply couldn't see? i don't know what we saw, but it was an unusual sight for us. i believe we attempted to video these lights and may have captured at least one of them on tape. should i locate footage of these lights, i will figure out how to send them to you.
content.summary: We wittnessed what looked like perfectly round glowing balls that appeared suddenly and hovered over the water. from our vantage point, we could see no evidence of flares.

content.detailedDescription: I sent the first picture in a couple months ago.The second and third pictures are three weeks later,and this time the object makes three directional changes in the space of a shutter click. it's obviously not a natural object,so what is it? with the dark spot on the side of it, it resembles the objects in the "nasa tether" video.
content.summary: Sphere returns to soho satelite webcam

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend noticed the object while driving in newport coast.  we stopped and watched for a minute or two and then left as traffic appeared on the road.  we were interested enough to search "orange county ufos" on google and came up with mufon.  maybe you can tell us if anyone else saw this or if this is something mundane and explainable.  

surprised enough to see something like this over a major city.  i have never seen an object basically dive-bomb so nimbly before then climb straight up.  it is dark but object looked like a wreath with lights.  red white green lights.  john wayne airport is nearby, but no plane, helicopter or anything else i can think of moved that way.  when not ascending or descending rapidly, object was turning in small circles.  girlfriend thought it was a toy.  i doubt this as it was so bright, high and large.  i think it was something from the airport.  was still able to see it from our apartment balcony over the trees when we returned home.  lost site of it when it went down below the skyline.

we may have a poor image video from a digital camera that i am not attaching at this time.
content.summary: Looks like a wreath with lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south towards delaware beaches heading into milford delaware, i had drove past a resteraunt called the loft. i was on the celphone with my friend when i noticed 2 bright lights, like airplane lights. as i got closer 4 more lights became visible and 2 lights diminished giving the object a sqaure like appereance. it looked like 4 lights on each corner shining really bright straight out. then the lights moved downward towards the ground and 2 huge red lights like floresent light bulbs glew underneath. the object was very big, was motionless just standing still as i was passing it and it didnt seem to far off of the ground probably 30 feet in the air. i had started passing it looking at it on my passanger side window when 3 cars pulled over on the side of the road to look at it. at this time i got very scared.

i went a little ways up to a gas station and got out to look at it. it then started to move towards the north heading in the driection of the air force base. 2 of the lights the diminished and the red floresent lights got shorter to 2 squares than started blinking. the object was very huge and seem to move very slow but was gone in seconds if that makes any sense. i wasnt sure if it was still there to be seen so i left the gas staion and made a u-turn to see if i could see it again but it was gone.

if what i saw was exlainable and maybe something im not sure of please email me and let me know.
content.summary: Square ufo?

content.detailedDescription: i was at home.7;o5pm.Outside on break from tile work.My tile partner was there also.I heard a jet high above in the clear night sky.I said to dave to try and locate the jet and watch it.I explained to him that i was looking at a jet last feb and saw a star like object descend and track the jet for a few seconds then it returned back to deep sky. so we looked up but could not see the jet before it had moved to far off to see.Suddenly i heard another jet way up there we spotted that one moving from east to west over charlevoix county mi.I told dave to keep his eye on it and the surrounding air space until it flies out of view.As we were watching daves mind started to wander and he started talking . i told him to get his eyes back on the jet until it flies away.I said we at least have to try.About 3-5 seconds after i said that is when i first noticed the starlike object descend from deep sky port side of jet.It covered a large distance quickly and soon was above the jet.It made movements unlike the straightline flight of the jet. then it moved away from the jet towards starboard and came to a stop.Now it looked like a star still no blinking lights.Then it moved more towards the north and was lost behind treetops. when it was over i asked dave what had he seen. davesaid something but he made no sense.He was visibly shaken. i took him inside and asked him again what had he seen. this time he told me what it was and i told him that that was the same thing i saw.He did not want to go back to the tile work and went home. i came in the house and called stanton friedman and he guide me to your web site.I also left a messsage with mufon colorado. the object had no sound. when i first noticed the object i thought it was alien craft because of its movement and speed variations and lack of noise.Its movements were precise in control and curving direction easily and with inteligent purpose speed was easily achieved which easily overtake the jet that it intercepted and looked at. it was incredable that finally i had a witness to one of my sightings. i have seen these craft up close stationary  sun shining off their shapes.
content.summary: Descent from deep sky south sweeping towards airline jet heading west.Over take jet within 1000 feet above and behind jet  slow down  then move towards north stop then move off behind treetops. jet engines were heard from the jet but the starlike object h

content.detailedDescription: We were looking at the starry night sky, realizing that it is near the peak of meteor shower.  it was a clear night and we were on a neighborhood walk.  looking at the pleiades saw the object traverse the sky in a southeast direction.  at first i thought it was a shooting star, but then i noticed, just as i expected it to disappear, that it continued.  then, i was able to truly focus on it and notice its shape and trajectory.  event was soundless, even though i waited to hear delayed engine noise.  event lasted long enough for me to have co-witness see it for at least half of the time.  the triangular shape was only lit on its front two margins and was dimly lit (like the color of clouds when lit by the orange lights of the nearby interstate.)  we were able to watch it on its perfectly straight path until it disappeared behind trees.
content.summary: Dimly lit triangular; compared with a jet, either fast, large, high or sim.Size, soundless and low

content.detailedDescription:
We were at my childhood home in i believe the year 1979 or 1980. i was about 10 or 11 years old at the time. my mother, sister and i were home, my dad was working late. it was dark outside, around 8:00pm and my aunt called saying she had been outside and could see something over our house and wanted us to go look and see what it was. my aunt lives approximently 5 miles away in a straight line. we went outside and to the south-west was a craft slowly moving towards our house. it was round and had multi-colored lights on it. we could see it was about 500 feet up in the air, probably 100 feet across, perspective was something about the size of your hand exteneded above your head. we could hear the sound of a propultion system, similiar to a rocket thrust, but smoother and not so loud, not a prop. we stood there and watched for a couple minutes as it slowly moved towards us and was right over our the house below us in clear view, again at about 500 feet up. i ran in the house to get a camera but we had no film. i ran baclk outside and we all stood there for a coupel more moinutes and that's when it took off. it went form a near standstill to instantly going 1000 miles per hour it seemed. it literally took off at the snap of a finger and streaked to the north about 3 or 4 moiles out, did a zig-zag pattern 3 times and then shot up in the air out of sight.

i beieve that same night, other people had reported seeing a ufo as well. this craft we saw, by the physics alone make it truly a ufo in that the g forces exerted in the way it accelorated instantly, would be impossible even today 27 years later. my mother and sister can attest to this event as well. we speak of it from time to time, and still are amazed at what we saw.
content.summary: Round craft hovered then took off very fast

content.detailedDescription:
As i looked south over the reservoir  i saw dancing red, white lights  like an airplane's but they moved erratically which a plane does not do, nor were there drones or engine noise! they moved  from east to west off the points of the ridge( san juan mountains).
this is as you look south from the elk point lodge inn by bayfield(?) colorado east of durango colorado. out across the reservoir looking south  beyond the  spillway .
 then it  happened that there was a second ight that was blue- white  and pulsing  that seperated from the parent light and i got the impression as it "flew"  or hovered along the eastern ridge of mountains on the east side of the reservoir as it combed along the ridge top that it was looking for something. searching. but not in an evil way. i was alert and observant. i still prayed anyway for  my wife's and my protection. then the search  ufo disappeared and the other one did but the primary one seemed to dance and mainatin its position for about 5 minutes longer. this was on a cold clear night.
this repeated on 10/21/06 but with out the ridge being "searched on the east" again!

   now also back in 2005 in prescott az in march of that year there was a sighting of the "second kind"  from the spielberg movie back in the 1970's( the one he made before e.T.) where there were lights and noise and  cloud cover descending and loud engine noises and the local police did not own anything with it nor did the air patrol there was a total black out for at least 1 hour....Power outages....But that is for another time...Anyone else in prescott az at that time? the funny thing is that there was no mention of the event in trhe newspapers and no one talked about that one! and there were at least 500 people affected in a city by it- north of prescott , along the highway north of the va hospital!!!  i made  sketches and details of that event.
 i have had at least 1--- besdies the above ---possibly 2 anomalies that i attribute to ufo's. and i checked out a crop circle in milan, illinois back in the early 1990's and believe me, there was so much corroborating evidence of a christian sister seeing something with lights zoom off from them and a farmer hearing his dogs and cows go crazy at night----- that was not a faked event!!!!!!!!!!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: While i looked south over the reservoir i saw erratic lights  dancing. there was no noise of a plane.

content.detailedDescription: I filed a detailed report and was knocked off after i submitted.  i submitted and i was asked for some more details and i was knocked off my internet explorer. so i will submit this and fill out the next form.  i hope that is okay?  here is a brief.  i was in my house when looking out my window i saw what looked like a colorful star move towards my direction which was odd for a star.  i had binoculars my 13 yr old son and my 55 yr old mother who all witnessed.  lights were blue red green bright flair bluish-white.  it moved as if sucked by a vacuum backwards and forward 2 times. when it moved backwards it actually disappeared and reappeared.  the lights seemed unnatural not like prisms of a diamond more like neonish but not like our aircrafts there were too many colors and variances.  sometimes the lights would twinkle like a star and others it would stay for a period of time. longer than the normal shifting stars do.  almost like it was communicating with someone and the colors were red or blue ect.  there is an airforce base in chicopee and i think they were sending out planes to look at it because they would fly by low and that is when it was doing the disappearing act.  then there was a helicopter that circled it up and down and around then left.  eventually the pretty colors went away and it looked like a star after that.  i know that sounds weird but its true.  i even ran up the street to see it better there was a lot of activity with aircraft checking it out.  my son saw it and my mother, all of us saw the colors in the binoculars when it was changing and moving, ect.  sometimes it would be all neon red then it would be the color if a camera flash bulb, then it was like a yellow white light.  i hope you get my other report because there are other sightings by me on that report, please let me know if you got them, if you can.  also, the ufo was being seen from dusk until nightfall and it was a very clear night with a pale sky.  thank you again, wendy
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Wasn't a star or helicopter and had witnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
I looked out my window and saw what looked like a star moving toward my direction and stop.  i thought it could be my eyes playing tricks on me but i called my 13 year old son and we ran outside quickly just in case.  we watched it change colors like a diamond would sparkle but it wasn't natural.  it was like artificial neon? light or something different.  i had my 55 year old mother come out while i got binoculars. we took turns looking and it was too hard to decipher exactly but we soon knew it wasn't a helicopter.  it was crazy it was as if an invisible vacuum sucked it backwards and it shrunk, or sped backwards, and turned yellow white light colored (like a light bulb color) then with the same motion came forward to its original position.  during this whole thing the colors would change from yellow light to green, red, blue, bright flair whitish blue.  but it wasn't exactly like a star and was evident of such in the binoculars.  the ufo moved again in the same way i described above exactly, and then it stayed in one place.  i know this will sound weird or stupid but in the end it stayed in one position and didn't look brilliant or odd.  another words the rest of the night it looked like a reg. wht star. after all the showing off.  also we are near an airforce base and i see all kinds of helicopters everyday and airplanes of many different sorts.  another important thing is it seemed to have gained attention from possibly the airforce base because small planes kept flying by it but they appeared to slow down near it and there was one helecopter that began to circle it and then left.
we all saw this and we all agreed it had a strangeness factor to it.  especially the movement and color changes, they were not normal at all.
i have seen things on 2 other occasions, one of which might have been a comet about a 4-6 wks ago. also, you may not be aware but the ufo diaries volume 1,crop circles, there are 2 ufo's the movie didn't point out. in the movie they were in england and two government helicopters were chasing a white light over a field. i don't know if the film maker noticed, but there were two ufo's going in and out of the clouds, zig-zagging, going up and down.  i only saw it because i was going frame by frame.  it is hard to see because they are going so fast you see blurring even in frame by frame. but it is still one of the best peices of footage i have ever seen.  nothing can move like this.  please let me know what you find.  
thank you, wendy
content.summary: This was not a star it was low set and on a flight path but it wasn't a helicopter either.

content.detailedDescription:
I submited this to nuforc several years ago, and thought i would submit it here as well.

it was christmas night 1999 and my son and i were outside on our back deck trying out his new telescope. we were out there for about an hour and a half and we were starting to get cold so we decided to go in. my son went in and i was packing up the telescope when i looked up and saw an object fly over my house from south to north. it was triangular shaped, but the points looked rounded. it also almost looked transparent, almost like it was a thick piece of glass. the only way i could see it at all was because the star light was being refracted at the edges as it moved through the sky. there was no sound, and it seemed quite large, but since i don't know how far away it was i don't really know how big it was.
content.summary: I looked up and saw an object fly over my house from south to north, it was triangular shaped, but the points looked rounded.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to grandparents house when i went across a field to make up time. when i was in the middle of the field a saw something in the air i looked at it and loked like a fast moving blimp no ordinary goodyear blimp a different one. so i stayed in the field for about 8-10 minutes when it left. during this time it stayed around the field and kept moving for a little then it left. it was not very active other then it moving around.
content.summary: Large blimp like shape 10 min. staying in an .25 mile range.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello' 

my name is jeff and i am 27 yrs old. i live in kincardine,ontario,canada on the western shores of lake huron. this is home to one of the worlds largest nuclear power plants...Bruce power.This experience happened about 15 yrs ago. i was around 12 yrs old...It was the summer before i entered high school...So how ever old u r then. 

anyways...This is what happened....And to me, its mind-blowing to look back on now!! 

so its about...I dont know..... 11:00 pm.. myself and 2 friends at the time were on our bikes down at the harbour on our pier....We have two piers....A north and south pier....We were on the north pier, cause back then we had a diving board on the pier where everyone would hang out. so were out on the pier standing around talking about having a sleep-over out at my dads. about 50meters? off the pier it looked like there was someone out in the water swimming....Looked like someone was doing the breaststroke...Doing lengths! back and forth, back and forth......We didnt think anything of it really...So anyways my one buddy already knew he could stay the night but my other buddy didnt...He had to ask his parents...So he took off on his bike back uptown to call his parents and ask.. me and my other buddy stayed at the pier. 10-15 mins later...He comes back...Everythings good...This is where things get weird and to alot of people,unbelievable!! so, we notice that things still there...Doing the same thing....Same pattern....Like someone was swimming!!!! now were starting wonder what this thing really is...Were curious. we start walking towards the diving board, which is maybe 15 ft from where we were..Asking each other "what is it?" and as we we reach the diving board i yell out " its a mermaid!!!" joking around...... just as i finished yelling that...This thing stopped moving in the water and it looked like it looked at us.....Went under the water,for seriously, less then a second and exploded out of the water in 3 bright lights...In the shape of a perfect triangle...Maybe 10ft between each light....This thing was out of the water and hovering literally 7-10ft in front of us off the pier in a matter of seconds......Rotated one way coming out the water....Stopped in front of us....Then took off rotating the other direction out over break wall then up into the air and gone!... i remember having to grab onto the diving board ladder because my entire body turned to basically jello and for some reason i could feel some sort of heat on my face. after we could move again....We ran!! like hell....Left our bikes and just ran off the pier....Took us about an hour to go back to get our bikes.....This happened and i will never forget it.... i saw something that without a doubt was not military made....Way too advanced!!
content.summary: 3 bright lights exploded out of water at myself and 2 friends

content.detailedDescription: Seen in the sky in a paking lot.I was 5 or 6 .I pointed them out to my parents,they did not look,they said it was the power lines.I could see they were not near the wires.
content.summary: Round colered lights,murging and sepearating.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my frends baceball game and in the forth inning and i saw a plane coming in the distance but when i looked in my bonoculars i saw a strange object about 4 seconds later i looked up and saw a small disc like ufo with 3 green lights in the middle with 1 blue ray type things coming out of the three green lights each blue ray came to the outer ring with was coverd whith small red lights. then sudinly a forth light appered it was a strange redish yelloyish color . my other frend mich asked what i was lookig at but i was in so much shock and aww that i could not speek. then i saw a bright flash and it was gone. i never told any one this story before until now.
content.summary: Small disc like three green lights in middle.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling west-bound on hwy. 529, just west of houston at approximately 5:30 pm yesterday, november 20th, stopped at a red light, when i noticed two glowing "patches" of light ahead, slightly to my left and fairly low on the horizon. my impression was that they were two to three miles away and each very large. there is air traffic in that area almost around the clock, but i'm a fairly experienced observer of air-craft and i don't believe that is what i was seeing. they moved very slowly in relation to one another and seemed to be decending, one a little lower than the other, and about a quarter mile apart. my attention was diverted for a split second when my cell phone, which was sitting in the seat next to me rang. when i looked back at the lights, the one on the right (the lower one) had dissapeared. i searched the sky around it to try and spot a fuselage or anything to indicate that it was perhaps a plane that had suddenly turned, but there was nothing and no where for it to have hidden itself; no clouds, no tree-tops. i focused on the other light as intensely as i could while driving slowly but had to focus on the traffic to come to another stop, my attention again only being diverted for a second. when i looked again the remaining light had vanished. there was no cloud cover and the sun had set below the horizon, beyond the location of the lights so it could not have been a reflection. i scanned the sky closely again and could not find a trace of any air craft that could have caused these things to appear. if anyone else saw them, please leave a message here.
content.summary: Two lights slowly decending, then vanishing.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the kitchen drinking water wen my dog started to bark and i went to the garage and looked out the garage fence. i noticed a huge bright lite in the sky and it looked like an airplane, but the only thing that was out of the ordinary is that it did int make any noise. i stood there for like 3 minutes and it never moved from the same spot. i tried to get my camera but wen i came back it was gone. this is my firs experience with the paranormal         especially with ufo.
content.summary: It was like a huge star in the sky.
